Title: 2. Stakeholders
Write-Up Text: People all around are talking about the Australian Budget and how it promises to bring targeted cost of living relief for millions of Australians. This Budget is all about improving access to healthcare cheaper childcare energy bill relief and help with rent assistance. The Budget is also being applauded as it focuses on closing the gap for Aboriginal and Torres Strait Islander Australians. The importance of making sure voices from the First Nations communities are heard in informing future budgets has also been highlighted. Gender equality is at the center of this budget and itâ€™s one of a kind!
